name: BetaflightBlackboxExplorer
description: A data analyser for Betaflight Flight Controller logs.

scripts.pack:osx: npm run clean:osx && electron-packager . 'Betaflight Blackbox Viewer' --out=./packages/osx --ignore=packages --ignore=dist --platform=darwin --arch=all --version=1.4.3 --icon=resources/images/icons/bf_blackbox_logo.icns --overwrite
scripts.pack:win: npm run clean:win && electron-packager . 'Betaflight Blackbox Viewer' --out=./packages/win --ignore=packages  --ignore=dist --platform=win32  --arch=all --version=1.4.3 --icon=resources/images/icons/bf_blackbox_logo.ico --overwrite
scripts.pack:linux: npm run clean:linux && electron-packager . 'Betaflight Blackbox Viewer' --out=./packages/linux --ignore=packages  --ignore=dist --platform=linux  --arch=all --version=1.4.3 --icon=resources/images/icons/bf_blackbox_logo.icns --overwrite
scripts.pack:all: npm run pack:osx && npm run pack:win && npm run pack:linux
scripts.build:all: npm run build:osx && npm run build:win && npm run build:linux

author: Gary.S.Keeble
